theres not a lot to say about tron 20  its a competent shooter that has elements which definitely show its age but its still a fun game with a really enjoyable set of weapons and a pretty fun story  that being said its a game based on a movie from 1982 that most people dont know exists  this is about as far from tron legacy as you could get but if you like the original its definitely worth giving this a play

what an awesome playthrough of a nostalgic game played beautiful on my older rig  3570k  48ghz  gtx 980  32gb ddr3 1600mhz     took a little bit of tweaking to get this older game to play on windows 10 smoothly but it was well worth the effort   used the tron 20 killer app mod manager   turned off the xp compatibility mode so that riva tuner statistics server framerate cap of 85 would work correctly any more fps than this causes game engine stutter
